Description.Text:
Position The hotel is situated in a quiet position, only some metres from the beach.
Restaurant Air conditioned restaurant.
More Informations Last refurbishment in 2008.
Sweet and salty breakfast buffet. Lunche and dinner served on buffet directly by the chef ot the kitchen and there will be a choice between 5 first dishes, 5 second disehs, mixed buffet of apetizers and vegetables, fruit or dessert. The hotel offers gluten free meals (certificated for Celiac) without any supplement. At breakfast there's als a biologic corner with biologic dishes. The prices in HB and FB includes from 15/06/13 till 06/09/13:beach service with 1 sun umbrella and 2 sun beds (double as single use: 1 sun umbrella + 1 sun bed). Who books from 01/06/13 till 14/06/13 or from 07/09/13 till 14/09/13 receives beach service if the minimum stay is of 7 nights.
The hotel has a relax pool of 20 mq, open from 01/06/13 till 08/09/13 from 9.30 am till midday and from 3.30 pm until 7.30 pm.
The hotel organizes different events from 01/06/13 till 07/09/13 as following: Typical Dinner on saturday; Aperitif on sunday; Wine Tasting on the beach at sunset once a week; Piadina Making once a week; Flamb√® evening once a week; Welcome Drink on saturday.
Check in from 2.00 pm. Check out until 10.00 am.
